p: A triterpene, 5α,6α-epidioxy-5β,6β-epoxy-9,13-dimethyl-25,26-dinoroleanan-3β-ol acetate, called aceranol acetate ( 122), which shows anti-inflammatory activity, was isolated from the stems and leaves of Acer mandshuricum [ 208]. The isolated compound also exhibited moderate activity against four human cancer cell lines (HL-60, SK-OV-3, A549, and HT-29).
